hotels.title: Ultra-Modern Kuala Lumpur Escape Moments from the Airport with Outdoor Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Moments from the Kuala Lumpur International Airport, this Mövenpick haven turns transit into tranquillity, the ideal base to put your feet up after touching down in Malaysia. Mornings at this five-star oasis begin with a spread of Western and Asian breakfast favourites, while afternoons are sweetened with Mövenpick’s signature hour of chocolate treats. When you're not out exploring Kuala Lumpur's bustling city centre, keep cool at the expansive outdoor pool, unwind with a treatment at the spa or savour a late-night plate of char kway teow delivered to your modern room. Keep up with your routine at the fitness centre, and slip seamlessly from meetings to poolside relaxation with spaces for the business traveller dotted around the hotel.
